Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Increases the amount of money furnished to incarcerated individuals upon release
Summary: Provides for eligible incarcerated individuals to receive a monthly stipend upon release from a state correctional facility.
LawCode: Add §12, Cor L; add §99-rr, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to increasing the amount of money furnished to incarcerated individuals upon release
